column4: Snardbafulator!  When you come back from bragging to your grandma upstairs about how many people you got to ban today, I will be waiting for you right by the hot water heater to shove chloroform in your face.  That will be the last thing you remember before you wake up with a ton of white viscous ooze coming out of your sweet sweet asshole.
